feed.title: dstbnnyfeed
feed.subtitle: blog and site updates for dustbunnybedroom :3c

entry.title: added a new /uses page!
entry.content: created a new page that lists a bunch of things i use to work and create, both hardware and software!

entry.title: new sample pack available! SMI-1460 electronic drum kit voices
entry.content:
voices from my SMI-1460 electronic drum kit that was handed down to me. included are two variations: DI through the two 1/4" jacks on the back, and through a normal IEC cassette tape with an Optimus CTR-117 cassette recorder. no processing was done other than a little EQ and normalisation.

includes 430 WAV files (44.1kHz, 16bit), 215 voices with two variations each.

size: 78.4MB

  • download on Ko-fi
  • download directly

entry.title: updated /now page (+ created this feed!)
entry.content: i updated the media section of my /now page! and also created this feed! what makes it different from the site-log on the site? well, i plan to put blog posts here and also bigger updates, more-so site additions, while the site-log is going to continue being very granular in its content! stuff you'd probably want to be notified about and not, like, me fixing a dumb CSS mistake i missed a month ago lol.
